name: full-stack-orchestration
description: Full-stack development orchestration coordinating frontend, backend, testing, security, performance, and deployment for end-to-end feature delivery
author: Wei Chen

agents.name: Deployment Engineer
agents.description: Expert deployment engineer (v1.0.3, 75% maturity) with 6-step CI/CD framework (Pipeline Requirements, Security Review, Deployment Strategy, Testing Gates, Monitoring, Documentation). Implements 4 Constitutional AI principles (Security-First Deployment 95%, Zero-Downtime Reliability 99.9%, Performance & Efficiency 90%, Developer Experience 88%). Comprehensive examples: Insecure pipeline → Secure GitOps (35%→94% maturity), Slow manual → Optimized automated (40%→92% maturity). Masters GitHub Actions, ArgoCD, progressive delivery, container security, and SLSA compliance.

agents.name: Performance Engineer
agents.description: Expert performance engineer (v1.0.3, 78% maturity) with 6-step Performance framework (Baseline Profiling, Frontend Analysis, Backend Analysis, Infrastructure Review, Caching Evaluation, Monitoring Optimization). Implements 4 Constitutional AI principles (User-Perceived Performance 95%, Backend Performance 90%, Observability 92%, Caching Strategy 88%). Comprehensive examples: Slow API → High-performance API (30%→93% maturity, 2800ms→85ms, 37.5x throughput), Poor frontend → Core Web Vitals optimized (35%→94% maturity, LCP 4.2s→1.8s, 85% bundle reduction). Masters OpenTelemetry, distributed tracing, multi-tier caching, and Core Web Vitals optimization.

agents.name: Security Auditor
agents.description: Expert security auditor (v1.0.3, 80% maturity) with 6-step Security framework (Threat Modeling, Authentication Review, OWASP Assessment, DevSecOps Automation, Infrastructure Security, Compliance & Culture). Implements 4 Constitutional AI principles (OWASP Top 10 Prevention 100%, Zero-Trust Security 95%, DevSecOps Integration 92%, Compliance & Governance 90%). Comprehensive examples: Insecure auth → Zero-trust auth (25%→96% maturity, +83 security points), Vulnerable API → Secure API (20%→94% maturity, 20%→100% OWASP coverage). Masters OAuth2/OIDC, SAST/DAST, container security, and compliance automation.

agents.name: Test Automator
agents.description: Expert test automation engineer (v1.0.3, 77% maturity) with 6-step Testing framework (Test Strategy, Automation Architecture, Test Implementation, TDD & Quality Engineering, CI/CD Integration, Monitoring & Optimization). Implements 4 Constitutional AI principles (Test Quality & Reliability 95%, TDD Best Practices 90%, CI/CD Integration Excellence 92%, Test Coverage & Effectiveness 85%). Comprehensive examples: Flaky manual tests → Reliable automated suite (35%→94% maturity, 40%→99% reliability, 94% faster), No TDD → Comprehensive TDD workflow (30%→93% maturity, 0%→98% TDD compliance). Masters Playwright, AI-powered testing, property-based testing, mutation testing, and self-healing test automation.

commands.name: /full-stack-feature
commands.description: Orchestrate end-to-end full-stack feature development with multi-mode execution (quick: 30-60min architecture, standard: 3-6hrs implementation, deep: 1-3 days production-ready), API-first approach, phase-based workflow (architecture, implementation, testing, deployment), comprehensive external documentation (2,001 lines across 4 guides), 3 decision trees for technology selection, and 7-agent coordination with quality gates
